title: To Verdener (Worlds Apart) [2008] [ENG SUB]
description:
OK, so I took a version of this film that I downloaded, and I added (hard-subbed) English Subtitles.

I also fixed some horrid typos, run-together words, and off timing in the subtitle file that is normally downloaded with this movie file.

---------

Seventeen year old Sara (Rosalinde Mynster) is, together with her family, member of Jehovah's Witnesses. After falling in love with the "non-member" Teis, she's torn between following her love (which of course is not well-seen) and staying in the religious movement - and thus with her family. Based on a true story.

---------
